title: Firefighter Robot
description: Teleoperated robot for mapping and gas detection with ROS2, featuring a React dashboard for monitoring and control.

title: Luna AI Assistant
description: Voice-controlled AI system designed for IoT applications, integrating AI and voice recognition technologies.

title: Autonomous UGV
description: Full-stack ROS navigation with sensor fusion for autonomous operation, including obstacle avoidance and path planning.

title: Welding Inspector
description: Weld quality analysis system using YOLOv8 for object detection, integrated with Flask for backend services.

title: Robotic Arm
description: STM32-controlled robotic arm with a ROS interface for seamless communication and control.

title: License Plate Detector
description: Vehicle identification system using ESP32-CAM and OpenCV for license plate detection.

title: Robot Dashboard
description: React-based web interface for controlling and monitoring ROS-controlled robots.

title: Parking System
description: Embedded system for real-time parking space monitoring and management.

title: Multithreaded Chat
description: Client-server chat application utilizing sockets for real-time messaging.

title: Image-Laser Converter
description: Open-source package for converting RGB images to laser scan data for robotics applications.
